title: Ticket #3609: Local Resource Testing - Static  and dynamic slots
description:
Local Resouce Testing job_local_resouces.run

This test has two parts. In the configuring of static slots we configure quantities as a hard count, a percent and a fraction and ensure we get the correct Ads published.

In the pslots we configure and then run a job or more to make sure the dynamic allocation was done.

Discovered how to have a fresh condor each time to ensure we dont have have conflicting configs.

We request all the ads for the dynamic slot after waiting a couple negotiation cycle to allow the updates to hit the collector.

Then we run again with couple waits and check the partionable slot for correct adjusted resources.
remarks: Make sure to test a script setting the local resource value.
